scripts.test: npm run compile-zcb-v2 && npm run compile-tokens && jest --runInBand
scripts.compile-zcb-v2: npm run compile-zcb-v2-issuer-abi && npm run compile-zcb-v2-issuer-bin
scripts.compile-USDT: solcjs -o contracts/tokens/artefacts/USDT/abi --abi --include-path node_modules/ --base-path . contracts/tokens/USDT.sol && solcjs -o contracts/tokens/artefacts/USDT/bin --bin --include-path node_modules/ --base-path . contracts/tokens/USDT.sol
scripts.compile-USDC: solcjs -o contracts/tokens/artefacts/USDC/abi --abi --include-path node_modules/ --base-path . contracts/tokens/USDC.sol && solcjs -o contracts/tokens/artefacts/USDC/bin --bin --include-path node_modules/ --base-path . contracts/tokens/USDC.sol
scripts.compile-tokens: npm run compile-USDT && npm run compile-USDC
